title: Support costs

commitmentDetails.belowThreshold: Your annual support cost is included in your commitment.
commitmentDetails.aboveThreshold: Your support costs are based on your monthly account usage.

details.FREE: This support plan is included with your account at no cost.
details.BASIC: This support plan is included with your account at no cost.
details.STANDARD: This amount includes your support costs for this month plus any overages.
